synopsis.text: Deciding to keep their beloved feline, Chii, the Yamada family faces the challenge of their 'no pets allowed' apartment policy. When a relative from Hokkaido offers to take Chii in, Youhei's parents believe it's the best option for her happiness. However, with only a month left before the separation, saying goodbye becomes increasingly difficult. A sudden phone call informs them that Chii's departure is imminent, forcing the family to confront their attachment to the young kitten. Determined to keep Chii as part of their family, they find a new pet-friendly home. As they prepare for the move, the question remains: will Chii adapt to her new surroundings?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
